analysis.description:
E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#543-591) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _toks == 0
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0

Reentrancy in E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#543-591):
	External calls:
	- _toks = iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#564)
	- iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInXferGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#578-579)
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#580-591)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#584)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol)

E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#543-591) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInXferGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#578-579)

Reentrancy in E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#543-591):
	External calls:
	- _toks = iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#564)
	- iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInXferGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#578-579)
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0 (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#580-591)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderIndexes (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#584)
	- numAccounts (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#584)
	- numToksSwitchedOver (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol)
E4Lava.vestTime should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xce5c603c78d047ef43032e96b5b785324f753a4f.sol#173-174)
